item.name: AppsCompleted
item.description: The number of applications submitted to YARN that have completed

item.name: AppsFailed
item.description: The number of applications submitted to YARN that have failed to complete

item.name: AppsKilled
item.description: The number of applications submitted to YARN that have been killed

item.name: AppsPending
item.description: The number of applications submitted to YARN that are in a pending state

item.name: AppsRunning
item.description: The number of applications submitted to YARN that are running

item.name: AppsSubmitted
item.description: The number of applications submitted to YARN

item.name: CapacityRemainingGB
item.description: The amount of remaining HDFS disk capacity

item.name: Container Allocated
item.description: The number of resource containers allocated by the ResourceManager

item.name: Container Pending
item.description: The number of containers in the queue that have not yet been allocated

item.name: Container Pending Ratio
item.description: The ratio of pending containers to containers allocated

item.name: Container Reserved
item.description: The number of containers reserved

item.name: Core Nodes Pending
item.description: The number of core nodes waiting to be assigned

item.name: Core Nodes Running
item.description: The number of core nodes working

item.name: CorruptBlocks
item.description: The number of blocks that HDFS reports as corrupted

item.name: DfsPendingReplicationBlocks
item.description: The status of block replication: blocks being replicated, age of replication requests, and unsuccessful replication request

item.name: HbaseBackupFailed
item.description: Whether the last backup failed

item.name: HDFSBytesRead
item.description: The number of bytes read from HDFS

item.name: HDFSBytesWritten
item.description: The number of bytes written to HDFS

item.name: HDFSUtilization
item.description: The percentage of HDFS storage currently used

item.name: IsIdle
item.description: Indicates that a cluster is no longer performing work, but is still alive and accruing charges. It is set to 1 if no tasks are running and no jobs are running, and set to 0 otherwise. This value is checked at five-minute intervals and a value of 1 indicates only that the cluster was idle when checked, not that it was idle for the entire five minutes. To avoid false positives, you should raise an alarm when this value has been 1 for more than one consecutive 5-minute check. For example, you might raise an alarm on this value if it has been 1 for thirty minutes or longer.

item.name: Live Data Nodes
item.description: The percentage of data nodes that are receiving work from Hadoop

item.name: Memory Used/Allocated
item.description: The amount of memory allocated to the cluster

item.name: Memory Free
item.description: The amount of memory available to be allocated

item.name: Memory Reserved
item.description: The amount of memory reserved

item.name: Memory Total
item.description: The total amount of memory in the cluster

item.name: MissingBlocks
item.description: The number of blocks in which HDFS has no replicas

item.name: MostRecentBackupDuration
item.description: The amount of time it took the previous backup to complete

item.name: MR Active Nodes
item.description: The number of nodes presently running MapReduce tasks or jobs

item.name: MR Decommissioned Nodes
item.description: The number of nodes allocated to MapReduce applications that have been marked in a DECOMMISSIONED stat

item.name: MR Lost Nodes
item.description: The number of nodes allocated to MapReduce that have been marked in a LOST state

item.name: MR Rebooted Nodes
item.description: The number of nodes available to MapReduce that have been rebooted and marked in a REBOOTED state

item.name: MR Total Nodes
item.description: The number of nodes presently available to MapReduce jobs. Equivalent to YARN metric mapred.resourcemanager.TotalNodes.

item.name: MR Unhealthy Nodes
item.description: The number of nodes available to MapReduce jobs marked in an UNHEALTHY state

item.name: PendingDeletionBlocks
item.description: The number of blocks marked for deletion

item.name: S3BytesRead
item.description: The number of bytes read from Amazon S3

item.name: S3BytesWritten
item.description: The number of bytes written to Amazon S3

item.name: TimeSinceLastSuccessfulBackup
item.description: The number of elapsed minutes after the last successful HBase backup started on your cluster

item.name: Total Load
item.description:
The current, total number of readers and writers reported by all DataNodes in a cluster.
Use case: Diagnose the degree to which high I/O might be contributing to poor job execution performance. Worker nodes running the DataNode daemon must also perform map and reduce tasks. Persistently high TotalLoad values over time can indicate that high I/O might be a contributing factor to poor performance. Occasional spikes in this value are typical and do not usually indicate a problem.

item.name: UnderReplicatedBlocks
item.description: The number of blocks that need to be replicated one or more times

item.name: YARNMemoryAvailablePercentage
item.description: The percentage of remaining memory available to YARN (YARNMemoryAvailablePercentage = MemoryAvailableMB / MemoryTotalMB). This value is useful for scaling cluster resources based on YARN memory usage.

trigger.name: Cluster IsIdle
trigger.description: Indicates that a cluster is no longer performing work, but is still alive and accruing charges. It is set to 1 if no tasks are running and no jobs are running, and set to 0 otherwise. This value is checked at five-minute intervals and a value of 1 indicates only that the cluster was idle when checked, not that it was idle for the entire five minutes. To avoid false positives, you should raise an alarm when this value has been 1 for more than one consecutive 5-minute check. For example, you might raise an alarm on this value if it has been 1 for thirty minutes or longer.
